summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of updated Tilo Live website with new logo, navigation, and sections. All new features working perfectly: About section with stats grid, Tilo Agency section with benefits, Tilo Streamer section with app features, 7-item navigation menu, footer quick links, WhatsApp channel link, contact form integration, and admin panel accessibility.

integration_issues.issue: Toast notification timeout - form submission works but success message may take longer than 5 seconds to appear

passed_tests: New logo displays correctly in navbar (customer-assets.emergentagent.com source)
New logo displays correctly in footer with proper styling
Navigation menu has exactly 7 items: Home, About, Tilo Agency, Tilo Streamer, Salary, Rules, Contact
About section displays with correct title and 4 stats cards (10K+ hosts, 500+ agencies, 24/7 support, $1M+ paid)
Tilo Agency section shows agent benefits and 'Join as Tilo Agent' CTA button
Tilo Streamer section displays host features and 3 app feature cards (Live Streaming, Private Calls, Virtual Gifting)
Anchor link navigation works correctly for About and Tilo Agency sections
Footer includes quick links to all sections (Home, About Us, Tilo Agency, Tilo Streamer)
WhatsApp channel link present in footer with correct text
Contact form accepts input and submits successfully (confirmed by admin panel showing 4 messages)
Admin panel accessible at /admin with login form
Admin dashboard loads with all tabs: Dashboard, Settings, Messages (4), Newsletters, Compose, SMTP
Admin panel shows contact form submissions working (4 total messages, 2 newsletter subscribers)
success_percentage: Frontend: 95% (13/14 - minor toast timing issue), Backend: Already tested 100%
